name: (don't) PANIC!
description:
(don't) PANIC! is a game where everything has gone out of control and its your job to put everything back together.  The spaceship is equipped with mediocre equipment that you have to fix while waiting for the main computer to reboot. Keep your attention on all the tasks at hand and try not to panic!

For a better experience, please download the game or play in fullscreen.

Controls:

Move: WASD
Interact: [Space]

This game was made for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam 2020.
